name: Lucky Dice 3D - Win Big Bonus
description:
Lucky Dice 3D, Rolling to Win!

The most popular leisure game in the United States has been upgraded! Regardless of gender, regardless of age, you can have fun here!

===Lucky Dice 3D===

A new version of the board game is coming! Totally free! Countless rewards! Come and join us! The next millionaire is you!

It's easy to play! Easy to win! This is Lucky Dice 3D! Where you will have endless fun and rewards!

Download it now and try your luck every day. The more you play, the more you win! What are you waiting for? Go and take your luck into the rain!

This game does NOT cost any real money.
Playing this game does not imply future success in "Real Money Gambling."
Apple Inc. does not sponsor, nor in any way affiliated with Lucky Dice 3D.
